text.0: these mens great bounty hath been manifested and the whole world of life set free from darkness.
text.1: great light hath come vouchsafed us by the fathers apparent is the spacious path of guerdon.
text.2: high up in heaven abide the guerdongivers they who give steeds dwell with the sun for ever.
text.3: they who give gold are blest with life eternal they who give robes prolong their lives o soma.
text.4: not from the niggardsfor they give not fireelycomes meed at sacrifice gods satisfaction.
text.5: yea many men with hands stretched out with guerdon present their gifts because they dread dishonour.
text.6: these who observe mankind regard oblation as streamy vāyu and lightfinding arka.
text.7: they satisfy and give their gifts in synod and pour in streams the sevenmothered guerdon.
text.8: he who brings guerdon comes as first invited chief of the hamlet comes the guerdonbearer.
text.9: him i account the ruler of the people who was the first to introduce the guerdon.
text.10: they call him Ṛṣi brahman sāmachanter reciter of the laud leader of worship.
text.11: the brightlyshining gods three forms he knoweth who first bestowed the sacrificial guerdon.
text.12: guerdon bestows the horse bestows the bullock guerdon bestows moreover gold that rsisters.
text.13: guerdon gives food which is our life and spirit he who is wise takes guerdon for his armour.
text.14: the liberal die not never are they ruined the liberal suffer neither harm nor trouble.
text.15: the light of heaven the universe about usall this doth sacrificial guerdon give them.
text.16: first have the liberal gained a fragrant dwelling and got themselves a bride in fair apparel.
text.17: the liberal have obtained their draught of liquor and conquered those who unprovoked assailed them.
text.18: they deck the fleet steed for the bounteous giver the maid adorns herself and waits to meet him.
text.19: his home is like a lake with lotus blossoms like the gods palaces adorned and splendid.
text.20: steeds good at draught convey the liberal giver and lightly rolling moves the car of guerdon.
text.21: assist ye gods the liberal man in battles the liberal giver conquers foes in combat.
